mapper.select: SELECT P.PETSITTER_NO AS petsitterNo, P.PETSITTER_NAME AS petsitterName, P.PETSITTER_INTRODUCE_ONELINE AS petsitterIntroduceOneline, ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(R.STARCOUNT,0)),1) AS starCount, COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO) AS reviewCount, F.PETSITTER_FILE_NAME AS petsitterFileName, F.PETSITTER_FILE_PATH AS petsitterFilePath, U.USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, U.USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS userAddressDetail FROM PETSITTER_INFO P LEFT OUTER JOIN PETSITTER_REVIEW R ON P.PETSITTER_NO = R.PETSITTER_NO, ( SELECT PETSITTER_NO,PETSITTER_FILE_NAME, PETSITTER_FILE_PATH FROM PETSITTER_FILE_INFO GROUP BY PETSITTER_NO ORDER BY REG_DT ) F, USER_INFO U WHERE P.PETSITTER_NO = F.PETSITTER_NO AND P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND P.EXPOSURE = 'true' GROUP BY P.PETSITTER_NO

SELECT PETSITTER_FILE_NO AS petsitterFileNo, PETSITTER_FILE_PATH AS petsitterFilePath, PETSITTER_FILE_NAME AS petsitterFileName FROM PETSITTER_FILE_INFO WHERE PETSITTER_NO = #{petsitterNo} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC

SELECT P.PETSITTER_NO AS petsitterNo, P.PETSITTER_NAME AS petsitterName, U.USER_ADDRESS AS userAddress, U.USER_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS userAddressDetail, P.PETSITTER_INTRODUCE_ONELINE AS petsitterIntroduceOneline, P.PETSITTER_INTRODUCE AS petsitterIntroduce, SMALLPET_DAY_PRICE AS smallpetDayPrice, SMALLPET_NIGHT_PRICE AS smallpetNightPrice, MIDDLEPET_DAY_PRICE AS middlepetDayPrice, MIDDLEPET_NIGHT_PRICE AS middlepetNightPrice, BIGPET_DAY_PRICE AS bigpetDayPrice, BIGPET_NIGHT_PRICE AS bigpetNightPrice, NECESSARY_ITEM AS necessaryItem, PETSITTERENV AS petsitterEnv, PETSITTER_HAS_PET AS petsitterHasPet, WALK_AVAILABLE AS walkAvailable, BATH_AVAILABLE bathAvailable, LONGTERM_AVAILABLE AS longtermAvailable, FIRSTAID_AVAILABLE AS firstaidAvailable, MARKING_IMPOSSIBLE markingImpossible, BOWEL_IMPOSSIBLE bowelImpossible, ATTACK_IMPOSSIBLE attackImpossible, SEPARATION_IMPOSSIBLE separationImpossible, BITE_IMPOSSIBLE biteImpossible, ROUND(AVG(IFNULL(R.STARCOUNT,0)),1) AS starCount, COUNT(R.REVIEW_NO) AS reviewCount FROM PETSITTER_INFO P LEFT OUTER JOIN PETSITTER_REVIEW R ON P.PETSITTER_NO = R.PETSITTER_NO, USER_INFO U WHERE P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND P.PETSITTER_NO = #{petsitterNo} GROUP BY P.PETSITTER_NO

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, R.USER_NO AS userNo, U.USER_NAME AS userName, R.STARCOUNT AS starCount, R.REVIEW_TEXT AS reviewText, F.FILE_PATH AS filePath, F.FILE_NAME AS fileName FROM PETSITTER_REVIEW R, USER_INFO U LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, REG_NO FROM FILE_INFO GROUP BY REG_NO ORDER BY REG_DT ) F ON U.USER_NO = F.REG_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND R.PETSITTER_NO = #{petsitterNo}
